description.en-US: ★★★★★ Access to some of the best casual games on 1 app 🎮 Play the latest games from top developers on a single app 🎯 no need to install each game individually 💻 Play over +100 HTMl5 games from a wide range of developers for FREE 🎲 We keep adding more/better games that you can play on your desktop/laptop computer 🎰 Join thousands of other players worwide and see your position in the rankings 💊 No need to install or clutter the computer with garbage, easy and clean 🏅 FEATURES ★ Only games that dont need WiFi – online games are now offline games 🎮 ★ Carefully selected – all games below 2MB 💻 ✔ Curated content – some of the best casual games 📰 ✔ Largest pool of casual games – 100+ games 🥊 ✔ New games each week – play without installing 🏈 PREMIUM FEATURES 🚨 App Booster 🚨 🐗 Support Oinkandstuff ———————————————————— ABOUT OINKANDSTUFF ———————————————————— 🐗 #OinkAndStuff is certified as 100% Free of malware 🐞 by Softpedia Labs 🔬 💎 +40 Apps for Google Chrome and Android 🔥 +1 Million active users Worldwide 📣 ———————————————————— CHANGELOG & RELEASE NOTES ———————————————————— 📔 Available on the product page: https://www.oinkandstuff.com/project/instant-games/#changelog ———————————————————— LEGAL ———————————————————— Instant Games is a partnership between Oinkanstuff and Gamezop. All the content/games are responsability of Gamezop. This is an independent project developed by Oinkanstuff and has no relationship to Gamezop. ———————————————————— PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE ———————————————————— By installing this product you agree to our privacy policy & terms of service: https://www.oinkandstuff.com/privacy-policy/ ———————————————————— FINAL NOTES ———————————————————— This information is also available inside the App: Options -> About
